text:
WOWZA.... I know this tool will save you all LOADS and LOADS of time: <https://www.articulatemarketing.com/hubtoolkit>
> Watch the videos on the landing page... I got teary eyed :sob::upside_down_face:
(I'm not affiliated with this tool in any way... just think it's super rad)

pretty cool. though not sure about that image resize/compress feature.
Can’t tell how it works, would be nice if it used HS’s resize functions instead of modifying the actual image.
modifying the image works for me! I can't count how many times the marketing team uploads 10MB images and puts them on pages.

When talking to Matthew, the guy who is creating this, he told me they built the image resizer because they changed blog templates... and had 500 blogs with wrong sized images (or the marketing team uploaded huge images).

<@U7SL518D6> that's the best route to go now.. but that's a newer function so not as many folks have used that... so when redesigning an old HubSpot site.. you can run into issues.
